title: Active Edge, AOD and battery saver feature requests & ideas
content:
Hi, i'd like to share my ideas for new features. The active edge is an awesome function with a lot of potential, it would be great to have mappable app shortcuts when screen is off (sleep).
Something like short squeeze for normal assistant, long squeeze for camera, 2 short squeezes for flashlight etc.
Also, the AOD could have an option to show only while charging.
Battery saver would be better if it had some customization, like haptic feedback on or off.
Thanks if anyone takes a look at this and forwards it further!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
